longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and/or passport replacing documents must be valid
  on arrival.
- British passports endorsed  British Citizen  that have been
  extended 12 months by an extension stamp contained within
  the passport are accepted.

Visa required, except for Holders of British passports.
Additional Information:
- Visitors are required to hold proof of sufficient funds to
  cover their stay and documents required for their next
  destination.
 - Not applicable to holders of British passports endorsed
    British Citizen  also holding a Belongers Card or expired
    British Overseas Territories Citizen  passport issued by
   Virgin Isl. (British).
Warning:
- Visitors not holding return/onward ticket could be refused
  entry. 



 Virgin Isl
